author: Jon Brodkin
title: Trump orders GM to make ventilators, claims company is “wasting time”
description: Trump invokes Defense Production Act after saying GM demanded too much money.
content:
Enlarge/ President Donald Trump speaks as Vice President Mike Pence looks on during a briefing on the coronavirus pandemic at the White House on March 26, 2020.
